summary: Play as Peter Dinklage, star of Game of Thrones. Actual size!
descriptionHtml:
This is my first ever upload to the Nexus so constructive criticism is welcome. I plan on releasing many more presets as part of a series in the near future. I decided to release this one separately so as to test the waters, so to speak.

  [b][u]There are two versions available;

[/u][/b]    Racemenu Preset:
      Requires: [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/365720/]SKSE[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45235/?]RaceMenu Skeleton Sliders[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url]
      [b]This version [u]DOES NOT[/u] include custom body settings, [u]ONLY FACE!
[/u][/b]      Install Manually, move file to Data/SKSE/PlugIns/CharGen/Presets.

    Save File:
      Requires: [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/365720/]SKSE[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45235/?]RaceMenu Skeleton Sliders[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start[/url]
      This version [b][u]DOES[/u][/b] contain custom body settings. There will be some clipping and odd animations but nothing too bad. You will likely get a message saying the save relies on missing content, continue anyway. I highly doubt you'll have any issues with this but please report any bugs or crashes.
      Install Manually, move to documents/mygames/skyrim/saves.


  [b]Highly Recommended:[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37347/?]Customizable Camera[/url]
    This is so you can adjust the third person camera to fit the new player height.
author: J_of_all_Ts
